title: Order Lakehouse Migration Phases
description: Arrange the phases of migrating from a traditional data warehouse to a lakehouse architecture in the correct order.
hints: Assessment comes before any data movement
Cutover happens only after validation succeeds
optimalSolution: Assessment → Landing Zone → Parallel Ingest → Schema Migration → Workload Migration → Validation → Cutover → Decommission
explanation: Lakehouse migration requires careful phasing. Assess existing workloads first. Set up the landing zone (storage, Unity Catalog). Run parallel pipelines for comparison. Migrate schemas to Delta. Move workloads incrementally. Validate outputs match. Cut over and finally decommission legacy systems.
